column4: Hi. At school i need to ssh to a server that i can't ssh to directly. But i can go through another server. How do i mount (sshfs) through a server?
mounting a filesystem is fifferent from just sshing to.. You can use 'sshfs' to mount a ssh  system to a local directory. You may want to check out ssh tunnles also
sure. But with sshfs i can mount the drive. Will look that up. Thanks
its not technically mounting a drive.. its letting you access teh ssh server from a local directroy. :)
